inscription.text: (From left top) 1. A cyclist, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 2. Flags and emblems of different countries in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany); 3. A coolie in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany); 4. A vehicle in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; (second row from left) 5. Rising sun from the map of India, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 6. A marketplace and balance in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany); 7. A lion in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany); 8. A sketch of a government building and a busy road in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; (third row from left) 9. A fountain and two heads of elephants in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 10. A number of women and a baby child in a label of Farbenfabriken Bayer, Leverkusen. ( made in Germany); 11. A warrior on a horse, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 12. Logo of Imperial Chemical Industries (India) Ltd. on its label ; (fourth row from left) 13. Gateway to India, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 14. Unicorn with a flag, in a label of Imperial Chemical Industries (India) Ltd.; 15. Taj Mahal, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay; 16. A bull, in a label of Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. Vudgadi, Bombay.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art"
511###Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

titleSet.title: 19 Labels by Dadajee Dhackjee & Co. Ltd. and others
